verse.name: v1
verse.lines: “Whosoever heareth,” shout, shout the sound! Spread the blessed tidings all the world around; Spread the joyful news wherever man is found: “Whosoever will may come.”

verse.name: c
verse.lines: “Whosoever will, whosoever will!” Send the proclamation over vale and hill; ’Tis a loving Father calls the wand’rer home: “Whosoever will may come.”

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Whosoever cometh need not delay, Now the door is open, enter while you may; Jesus is the true, the only Living Way: “Whosoever will may come.”

verse.name: v3
